description: This file contains CSS styles for the theme management and layout of a web application component, specifically the App component of a Tic Tac Toe game.

classes.name: App
classes.description: The main container for the application with center-aligned content.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Class applied to the application logo, controlling its size and animation.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Header section of the application, styled for flexibility and centering of elements.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Styling for links within the application.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Button for toggling between light and dark themes.
